text: Héctor Oscar Rivoira (10 April 1960 – 14 August 2019) was an Argentine football manager and player. He was born in Buenos Aires. He worked as the manager of Chacarita Juniors and Atlético Tucumán. He played for Almirante Brown from 1981 to 1984. Rivoira died on 14 August 2019 in Buenos Aires from colorectal cancer at the age of 59. ==References== ==Other websites== *Argentine Primera statistics at Futbol XXI Category:1960 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Footballers from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine football managers Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer
title: Héctor Rivoira
